General.Name: Hangzhou Sunrise Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Hangzhou Sunrise Technology Co., Ltd. designs, develops, manufactures, and sells electricity energy meters and power information collection systems in China. Its products include smart energy meters, water meters, concentrators, special purpose terminals, distribution terminals, and charging piles. The company was founded in 2001 and is based in Hangzhou, China.

6.Name: Mr. Gan Cai  Jiang
6.Title: Deputy GM & Sec. of the Board
